definition: fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: Liu, in the inside lane, was limping badly before he even reached the first hurdle.
sentences.chinese: 在他還未抵達第一個欄架時就已經明顯一瘸一拐了。
